+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+# xorq_build_and_run.sh — build a xorq expression and immediately run it
+#
+# Usage:
+#   ./xorq_build_and_run.sh <script.py> [-e <expr_name>] [-o <output_path>] [-f <format>]
+#
+# Examples:
+#   ./xorq_build_and_run.sh simple_example.py
+#   ./xorq_build_and_run.sh simple_example.py -e expr
+#   ./xorq_build_and_run.sh iris_example.py -e expr -o results.parquet
+#   ./xorq_build_and_run.sh simple_example.py -f json -o -
+
+set -euo pipefail
+
+usage() {
+    echo "Usage: $0 <script.py> [-e expr_name] [-o output_path] [-f format]"
+    echo ""
+    echo "Arguments:"
+    echo "  script.py       Python file containing a xorq expression"
+    echo ""
+    echo "Options:"
+    echo "  -e expr_name    Expression variable name (default: expr)"
+    echo "  -o output_path  Output file path (default: none, discards output)"
+    echo "  -f format       Output format: parquet, csv, json, arrow (default: parquet)"
+    exit 1
+}
+
+if [ $# -lt 1 ]; then
+    usage
+fi
+
+SCRIPT_PATH="$1"
+shift
+
+EXPR_NAME="expr"
+OUTPUT_ARGS=()
+
+while [ $# -gt 0 ]; do
+    case "$1" in
+        -e) EXPR_NAME="$2"; shift 2 ;;
+        -o) OUTPUT_ARGS+=("-o" "$2"); shift 2 ;;
+        -f) OUTPUT_ARGS+=("-f" "$2"); shift 2 ;;
+        -h|--help) usage ;;
+        *) echo "Unknown option: $1"; usage ;;
+    esac
+done
+
+if [ ! -f "$SCRIPT_PATH" ]; then
+    echo "Error: $SCRIPT_PATH not found" >&2
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+echo "==> Building '$EXPR_NAME' from $SCRIPT_PATH"
+BUILD_PATH=$(xorq build "$SCRIPT_PATH" -e "$EXPR_NAME")
+
+echo "==> Running build at $BUILD_PATH"
+xorq run "$BUILD_PATH" "${OUTPUT_ARGS[@]}"
